item.description:
Imagine yourself in your own rowing shell.... Blending balance, power, and finesse as you move through the water. Now think about that while being in the beautiful Little Harbor in Marblehead. Can you say paradise? Continue on your path to rowing zen with this rowing skill development program. Build off of what you have previously learned to further refine your stroke.
Prior rowing experience is required.

Classes take place in single Echo Rowing shells. Class limited to 4 scullers. Each session runs six weeks with two 1 1/2 hour classes/week.

Price: Spring/Summer/Fall 6-week sessions: $325

May 7 - June 13 - Monday / Wednesday - 6:30 - 8:00 am

June 25 - August 1 - Monday / Wednesday - 5:30 - 7:00 am
June 26 - August 2 - Tuesday / Thursday - 7:00 - 8:30 am

August 6 - September 12 - Monday / Wednesday - 6:00 - 7:30 am
August 7 - September 13 - Tuesday / Thursday - 7:30 - 9:00 am

September 18 - October 25 - Tuesday / Thursday - 7:00 - 8:30am
September 18 - October 25 - Tuesday / Thursday - 8:30 - 10:00am

For more info call 781-990-3552
Sign-up on-line today to secure your seat!

Make checks payable to: Rowing For All LLC
Little Harbor Boathouse, 40 Doaks Lane, Marblehead, MA 01945

Be Strong • Live Well • Have Fun

group.name: Community Rowing & Paddling on Boston's North Shore Meetup

item.name: Adult Developmental Sculling Class at Little Harbor Boathouse
